overview: Ted Henley lives with his father in their run down motel on a desolate stretch of road. He earns his tiny allowance by collecting the roadkill that litters the highway.  But when the motel cash register starts to run dry, Ted turns his attention to collecting bigger game.
tagline: Meet 9-year-old Ted Henley â€“ budding motel manager, and roadkill entrepreneur.
title: Henley
